alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:59PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls County through 230 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hollister, or 14 miles southwest of Twin Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hollister around 200 PM MDT. Kimberly, Hansen and Rock Creek around 220 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
